product_name: Black Diamond HotWire Wiregate Carabiner - Blemished
long_description: The carabiner that started the wiregate revolution, the Black Diamond HotWire(R) Carabiner features a versatile, cold-forged design that's easy to use and is ideal for use in alpine conditions. Large internal space of the HotWire 'biner accommodates your finger and the rope while clipping. Does not freeze up in alpine conditions. Works well as the rope-end carabiner on a quickdraw. Blemished; item has minor cosmetic blemishes that do not affect product performance.
short_description: The carabiner that started the wiregate revolution, the Black Diamond HotWire(R) Carabiner features a versatile, cold-forged design that's easy to use and is ideal for use in alpine conditions.
